shows.title: House of Cards
shows.description: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

shows.title: Daredevil
shows.description: A blind lawyer with his other senses superhumanly enhanced fights crime as a costumed superhero.

shows.title: Orange Is the New Black
shows.description: The story of Piper Chapman, a woman in her thirties who is sentenced to fifteen months in prison after being convicted of a decade-old crime of transporting money for her drug-dealing girlfriend.

shows.title: Arrested Development
shows.description: Level-headed son Michael Bluth takes over family affairs after his father is imprisoned. But the rest of his spoiled, dysfunctional family are making his job unbearable.

shows.title: Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt
shows.description: A woman is rescued from a doomsday cult and starts life over again in New York City.

shows.title: Marco Polo
shows.description: In a world replete with greed, betrayal, sexual intrigue and rivalry, "Marco Polo" is based on the famed explorer's adventures in Kublai Khan's court in 13th century China.

shows.title: Bloodline
shows.description: A family of adult siblings find that their secrets and scars are revealed when their black sheep of a brother returns home.

shows.title: BoJack Horseman
shows.description: Meet the most beloved sitcom horse of the '90s - 20 years later. BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit TV show "Horsin' Around," but today he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

shows.title: Hemlock Grove
shows.description: A teenage girl is brutally murdered, sparking a hunt for her killer. But in a town where everyone hides a secret, will they find the monster among them?

shows.title: The Killing
shows.description: A police investigation, the saga of a grieving family, and a Seattle mayoral campaign all interlock after the body of 17-year-old Rosie Larsen is found in the trunk of a submerged car.

shows.title: Love
shows.description: A program that follows a couple who must navigate the exhilarations and humiliations of intimacy, commitment and other things they were hoping to avoid.

shows.title: Master of None
shows.description: The personal and professional life of Dev, a 30-year-old actor in New York.

shows.title: Flaked
shows.description: Will Arnett will star as a self-help guru who needs a decent amount of help himself.

shows.title: Jessica Jones
shows.description: A former superhero decides to reboot her life by becoming a private investigator.

shows.title: Narcos
shows.description: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

shows.title: Wet Hot American Summer: First Day of Camp
shows.description: Follow the counselors and campers on their first day at Camp Firewood in the summer of 1981.

shows.title: Club de Cuervos
shows.description: When the patriarch of a prominent family dies, his heirs battle to determine who will gain control of his beloved soccer team: The Cuervos of Nuevo Toledo.

shows.title: Making a Murderer
shows.description: Filmed over a 10-year period, Making a Murderer is an unprecedented real-life thriller about Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

shows.title: Sense8
shows.description: A group of people around the world are suddenly linked mentally, and must find a way to survive being hunted by those who see them as a threat to the world's order.

shows.title: Fuller House
shows.description: D.J. Tanner-Fuller is a widow and mother of three. Things become too much to handle, so she asks for help from her sister Stephanie and her best friend Kimmy.

shows.title: A Series of Unfortunate Events
shows.description: After the loss of their parents in a mysterious fire, the three Baudelaire children face trials and tribulations attempting to uncover dark family secrets.

shows.title: Luke Cage
shows.description: Given superstrength and durability by a sabotaged experiment, a wrongly accused man escapes prison to become a superhero for hire.

shows.title: Black Mirror
shows.description: A television anthology series that shows the dark side of life and technology.

shows.title: The OA
shows.description: Having gone missing seven years ago, the previously blind Prairie returns home, now in her 20s with her sight restored. While many believe she is a miracle, others worry that she could be dangerous.

shows.title: Stranger Things
shows.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying forces in order to get him back.

shows.title: The Crown
shows.description: The early reign of Queen Elizabeth II of the United Kingdom is portrayed.

shows.title: Santa Clarita Diet
shows.description: Sheila and Joel are married real estate agents in Santa Clarita, California. When Sheila dies, their lives take a dark turn.

shows.title: Gilmore Girls: A Year in the Life
shows.description: Set nearly a decade after the finale of the original series, this revival follows Lorelai, Rory and Emily Gilmore through four seasons of change.
A thriller set in a world sharply divided between progress and devastation, where people are given the chance to make it to the "better side" but only 3% of the candidates succeed.

shows.title: w/ Bob & David
shows.description: Bob and David emerge from the time machine they entered sixteen years ago and are reunited with the cast of Mr. Show.
